name: Dream Dungeon
description:
Dream Dungeon is an action RPG dungeon crawler based around a dream theme with mages.

Players will progress the protagonist, Neru, through a series of random hand-crafted dungeons, which will yeild stronger enemies, bosses, and items the further they progress.

I've taken heavy inspiration from titles like Disgaea and FFT in terms of progressing characters (obviously scoped down). Most notably, players will be able to unlock new jobs / professions to change the main character to.

Currently it's a windows-only demo, but should work on Wine. Please check out the ReadMe.txt included in the demo.

Tumblr: http://dreamdungeon.tumblr.com/
